arm_group.description: Subjects receive multiple BID doses of BI 144807 solution
Subjects receive multiple BID doses of Placebo solution

brief_summary.textblock:
In this trial the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and exploratory pharmacodynamics of
      multiple dose administration of BI 144807 will be investigated in otherwise healthy,
      controlled asthmatic patients

clinical_study.brief_title: Multiple Rising Dose Study of BI 144807 Powder in Bottle in Mild Asthmatic Patients

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:

        1. mild asthmatic, otherwise healthy subjects (male and female of non-childbearing
        potential)

        Exclusion criteria:

        1. Apart from mild asthma any relevant deviation from healthy conditions

intervention.description: multiple dose (bid, low to high dose)

clinical_study.official_title: Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Exploratory Pharmacodynamics of Multiple Rising Doses of BI 144807 Powder for Oral Drinking Solution Over a Period of 14 Days in Otherwise Healthy Controlled Asthmatic Subjects in a Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Trial

oversight_info.authority: United Kingdom: Medicines and Healthcare Products Regulatory Agency

primary_outcome.measure: Number (% patients) of drug-related adverse events

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma after first dose (Cmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hours after first dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum measured concentration of the analyte in plasma after last dose (Cmax,ss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hours after last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from first dosing to maximum measured concentration (Tmax)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hours after first dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Time from last dosing to maximum measured concentration (Tmax,ss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hours after last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval from t1 to t2 after administration of the first dose (AUCt1-t2)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hours after first dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma at steady state over a uniform dosing interval t (AUCt,ss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hours after last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal half-life of the analyte in plasma after the first dose (t1/2)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 24 hours after first dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Terminal half-life of the analyte in plasma at steady state (t1/2,ss)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hours after last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: RA,Cmax (Accumulation ratio of the analyte in plasma at steady state after multiple oral administration over a uniform dosing interval τ, expressed as ratio of Cmax at steady state and after single dose)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hours after last dose

secondary_outcome.measure: RA,AUC (Accumulation ratio of the analyte in plasma at steady state after multiple oral administration over a uniform dosing interval τ, expressed as ratio of AUC at steady state and after single dose)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: up to 72 hours after last dose

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Safety Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double-Blind, Primary Purpose: Treatment
